name: All relevant KCL drawings and revision numbers checked and attached
Correct fasteners used and installed at correct centres
Fasteners – 12mm from the edges and 18mm from ends
Fasteners – 200mm centres along sheet end butt joints
Are screws over driven? If YES, install a new screw fixing 25mm away and adjacent to the over driven screw.
Is the GIB installed hard up against the floor.
